name: Harris County Criminal Court Data Options
labels: There are three tabs provided : General, Details, Settings
Details tab is present to provide details on the state of HCC database.
Settings tab is present to allow user control of useful properties in HCC database.

name: Data Selection Mode
labels: Mines data using local database, offers faster search but requires pre-load of data.
Mines data using web scraping, slower search but more reliable in data mapping.

name: HCC Database - Preload - Header
description: Controls the data load of header data, off or on. Default value is on.

name: HCC Database - Preload - Detail
description: Controls the data load of detail data, off or on. Default value is on.

name: HCC Database - Preload - Detail Days
description: Controls the data load of detail data, setting the number of business days to preload.
